Articles.Content:
I wanna land on the inlet spaceport on the hawai'i like island because I'm going to hawaii in march.

Should I try?
No, why would you ever bother going to Hawaii?
No, going to Hawaii will take time away from KSP. Sell the tickets, use the money to upgrade your computer/monitor and play for 2 solid weeks.

I am with the other guys on this. I would not reccommend you going to Hawaii. I personally have never been there before, but haven't heard any good things yet. Maybe because I never asked anyone about Hawaii, but thats not the point. I have been to the Island you mentioned in KSP and I highly suggest you skip your Hawaii trip and go there instead, it's well worth it.
